report.title: Blurred PoMS results mapping
report.description: All PomS results for map. Includes blurred location data. Note this will only work on BRC Live Warehouse as I had to include hard-coded survey IDs 636, 637, 638, 641
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_samples_functional s JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional csnf on csnf.id = s.id LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences_functional cof on cof.sample_id = s.id and cof.taxon_meaning_id in (#bumblebee_taxon_meaning_id#,#honeybee_taxon_meaning_id#,#solitary_bee_taxon_meaning_id#,#wasp_taxon_meaning_id#,#hoverflies_taxon_meaning_id#, #other_flies_taxon_meaning_id#,#butterflies_moths_taxon_meaning_id#,#beetles_taxon_meaning_id#,#small_insects_taxon_meaning_id#,#other_insects_taxon_meaning_id#) LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional conf on conf.id = cof.id #agreements_join# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist# AND s.survey_id in ( #public_fit_count_survey_id#,#1km_fit_count_survey_id#,#fit_count_app_survey_id# ) AND ((trim('#year#') = '' OR '#year#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST('#year#' || '-01-01' as date)) AND (trim('#year#') = '' OR '#year#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST('#year#' || '-12-31' as date))) AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying) = '#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='')

param.name: year
param.description: Select a year, or leave blank for all years

param.name: public_fit_count_survey_id
param.description: ID of the public fit count survey.

param.name: 1km_fit_count_survey_id
param.description: ID of the 1km fit count survey.

param.name: fit_count_app_survey_id
param.description: ID of the fit count app survey.

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of sample IDs to filter to.
